attributes.action: SAVE this Newborn Baby, bring this 'woman' to justice
attributes.additional_details:
This e-petition is to bring this 'woman' to justice and to ensure this baby is safe and loved.

This 'woman' can be seen shaking this newborn baby around like a ragdoll in the most horrific way. She laughs as she does it. Please help to identify her, and bring this woman to justice

https://www.facebook.com/SaveThisNewbornBaby.BringThiswomanToJustice#

This 'woman' could have easily caused dislocated limbs, Shaken Baby Syndrome (SBS) and even death.
